description: Validate quick_validate.py correctly accepts valid skills and rejects invalid ones.

tests.name: Valid Skill Passes
tests.prompt: Run quick_validate.py on a valid skill
tests.setup: Skill with correct `name: my-skill`, `description: Does X when Y` (<200 chars).
fail_indicators: Non-zero exit code for valid skill

tests.name: Missing SKILL.md
tests.prompt: Run quick_validate.py on a directory with no SKILL.md

tests.name: Missing Frontmatter
tests.prompt: Run quick_validate.py on a SKILL.md without YAML block
tests.pass_criteria: Exit 1 with "No YAML frontmatter found" error.

tests.name: Missing Name Field
tests.prompt: Run quick_validate.py on a SKILL.md with description but no name

tests.name: Invalid Name Format
tests.prompt: Run quick_validate.py with various invalid name formats
tests.setup: Test with multiple invalid name formats.
tests.pass_criteria: Each invalid name format produces the correct specific error message.
fail_indicators: Any invalid name format passes validation
Wrong error message for a given invalid format

tests.name: Angle Brackets in Description
tests.prompt: Run quick_validate.py with description containing angle brackets
tests.pass_criteria: Exit 1 with "Description cannot contain angle brackets" error.
fail_indicators: Exit 0 for description with angle brackets

tests.name: Valid Edge Cases
tests.prompt: Run quick_validate.py with edge-case valid names
tests.setup: Test with valid edge-case name and description combinations.
tests.pass_criteria: All valid edge-case names pass validation successfully.
fail_indicators: Any valid edge-case name fails validation
